ISSUE.TITLE: Fixed:Re-index database tables was not work
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/76e9bf4c3c1c3730367cd88a04ef2dd0061d6dc1/src/Libraries/Nop.Data/DataProviders/MsSqlDataProvider.cs#L233 Issue:When i try to re-index database tables i was get this error Invalid object name "mystoredb.information_schema.tables" and I change to upper case and its fixed(information_schema.tables->INFORMATION_SCHEMA)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6592 Use uppercase to use the INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES view
